name: Evade HD
description:
Simple rules, simple gameplay, damn hard. 

Compete with your friends and people across the globe with the daily global rankings. 

The goal is simple, move your player around by tilting the device, avoid the walls and evade enemies to stay alive. That's all there is to it. 


* 60 levels included, going from easy to hard
* Easy to control, uses accelerometer 
* Builtin music or listen to your own 
* Online leaderboard
